Title: Down with Liu Shaoqi!
Designer: Zhejiang Worker-Peasant-Soldier Art Academy (浙江工农兵美术大学)
Publisher: Zhejiang Worker-Peasant-Soldier Pictorial Editorial Department (浙江工农兵画报编辑部)
Notes: The text in the background is the 'Communique of the Enlarged 12th Plenary Session of the Eighth Central Committee of the Communist Party of China', held October 1968, during which the "Report on the Examination of the Crimes of the Renegade, Traitor and Scab Liu Shaoqi" was ratified.
